seedwords.save: Please keep your mnemoric words carefully; it is the only way to restore your account.

sync.title: Cart Synchronization
sync.desc: Some items are available on both of Tmall Supermarket and JD Supermarket. Click the button to sync items across carts.

desc.tojd: For items available in both carts, the total price at JD is ¥{price}, lower than Tmall by ¥{saved}
desc.totaobao: For items available in both carts, the total price at Tmall is ¥{price}, lower than JD by ¥{saved}
desc.same: For items available in both carts, they are exactly the same price. You may shop on either of them.

assemble.title: Smart Combination
assemble.desc: For items available in both carts, the lowest total cost is ¥{price}. Click the button to split desired items into 2 orders, one for each site, and the total cost will be lower than buying all at once.
